portfolio.name: Dimitri Marco
portfolio.about: Freelancer providing services for programming and design contentneeds. Join me down below and let's get cracking!
portfolio.services: Since the beginning of my journey as a freelance designer and developer, I've done remote work for agencies consulted forstartups and collaborated with talanted people to create digital products for both business and consumer use. I offer from a wide range of services, including brand design, programming and teaching.
portfolio.service_desc_1: Creating elegant designs suited for your needs following core design theory.
